name: slyness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour that is clever in order to deceive people and get what you want: The prosecution appealed to popular stereotypes about the slyness of women. He uses all his slyness to provoke a confrontation with his son.
behaviour that suggests that you know secrets: Girls she'd been to school with said, "Welcome," and some had slyness in their smiles. See
sly
More examplesFewer examplesHe bowls with a lethal combination of speed and slyness.Folk tales are an important way in which a society teaches us to associate foxes with slyness.Those looks - do they contain a touch of slyness?
